page.title: 08Denbeath Primary School
page.content: Our school has 140 pupils on its roll. This figure includes nursery pupils. The children mostly come from the area immediately surrounding the school and from part of Methil,lying South of Methilhaven Road, although some nursery children come from the "Bird" scheme North of Methilhaven Road in Buckhaven. The building is old. It was built in 1908.A modernisation programme is to be started in August this year. The heating and wiring systems are to be replaced,the classrooms are to be renovated ,redecorated and fitted with fixed furnishings.Best of all,we are to have our own kitchen ,where school meals are to be cooked.No more central kitchen dinners! We can hardly wait till April l986,when the work will be completed.
